<cs> my lords i have nothing to add to what has already been said in another place in answer to questions and statements <e>

<cs> my lords i assume the noble lords question refers to an interview with the prime minister on th june on the bbc television programme panorama <e> <s> remarks made by the prime minister during that interview did not begin to constitute any encouragement to the chiefs of staff to resign <e>

<cs> my lords the original question was that the house do now resolve itself into a committee upon the bill since when an amendment has been moved in the terms set out on the order paper <e> <s> the question is that this amendment be agreed to <e> <s> as many as are of that opinion will say content to the contrary not-content <e>

<cs> my lords before the commencement of business i take the opportunity to inform the house that i have accepted an invitation from the prime minister to attend a lunch in honour of his majesty king hassan ii of morocco on wednesday th july <e> <s> accordingly i trust that the house will agree to grant me leave of absence for wednesday th july <e>

<cs> my lords a file of evidence concerning alleged offences of gross indecency and indecent assault by mr oliver grieveson against his three sons was submitted by the cleveland constabulary to the cleveland branch of the cleveland/north yorkshire crown prosecution service in december <e> <s> the three sons mr oliver paul grieveson mr barry grieveson and mr philip grieveson are now aged and respectively <e>

<cs> my lords before the commencement of business i take the opportunity to inform the house that with the approval of her majesty the queen i have accepted an invitation from the first president of the italian corte suprema di cassazione to attend the next meeting of presidents and procurators general of the supreme courts of countries of the european communities which is to take place in venice from st to rd october <e> <s> accordingly i trust that the house will agree to grant me leave of absence from tuesday th october to thursday nd october <e>
<cs> my lords i have to notify the house in accordance with the royal assent act that the queen has signified her royal assent to the following acts <e>
<cs> my lords i beg to move the motion standing in my name on the order paper <e>
<cs> my lords i beg to move that the bill be now read a second time <e>
